name: Kenji
text: Fujiwara chi,Maybe i lost my cooking skill

name: Kenji
text: Why?I am losing my family delicacy,no matter how i try,it wont work

name: Fujiwara
text: Tehe~It's for the witch of gachha attack and cursed us,nobody cant cook sushi without deadly portion

name: kenji
text: Whatttt???...now how will i cook sushi

name: Fujiwara
text: You see,there is a neverworld portal,there lives the witch,go,get em

name: kenji
text: Imma go hunt that witch don....
